about_the_game:
We, [THE EMPLOYER], would like to invite you, [THE CANDIDATE], to a perfectly legal and safe [TEST RUN] for candidacy in a high-performing position on the cutting-edge of technology.

After all, you're certainly in no position to refuse.

Disclaimer: Demo is not representative of the final product

content_descriptors.notes: Levels contain blood on the floor.

detailed_description:
We, [THE EMPLOYER], would like to invite you, [THE CANDIDATE], to a perfectly legal and safe [TEST RUN] for candidacy in a high-performing position on the cutting-edge of technology.

After all, you're certainly in no position to refuse.

Disclaimer: Demo is not representative of the final product

fullgame.name: That Time I Got Trapped in an Office Dungeon

name: That Time I Got Trapped in an Office Dungeon Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Core™ i5-4670 (quad-core) / AMD® FX-Series™ FX-4350 (quad-core)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA® GeForce® GTX 1050 (2 GB) / AMD® Radeon™ RX-460 (4 GB) / Intel® Arc™ A380 (6 GB)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: How far are you willing to go to for a job? We're a family here after all. Explore a unique 2nd person horror puzzle adventure that will put your spatial reasoning to the test.
